description: Colourful, budget-friendly and packed with flavour, this harissa-flavoured chicken, veg and lentil bowl is perfect for a quick and easy dinner.
name: Middle-Eastern Inspired Chicken & Veggie Bowls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 tbs harissa Middle Eastern spice blend
150 g Woolworths baby leaf salad mix

recipeInstructions.text: Divide salad mix among bowls. Top with rice mixture, chicken mixture and chilli yoghurt. Serve scattered with pine nuts and remaining chilli.
